Description: GIBSON EPIPHONE LES PAUL Classic Trans. AMBER BIRDS EYE Electric Guitar An excellent Gibson Epiphone Limited Edition electric guitar!!! It has a beautiful transparent Amber Birds Eye finish on a multi-bound carved/arched top body, a 22 fret bound Rosewood fretboard with Pearl type Gibson Bell Trapazoid block inlays, set neck construction, and it has 2 exposed humbucker pickups that sound great! It is 24.75 scale, the neck width at the nut is 1 & 5/8", and it weighs 9.2 pounds. The condition is good(a 7.9 out of 10) with light normal signs of use and shows light fret wear, the guitar is really nice all around with no problems except for light scratches and dings, and some strap wear on the bottom(See pics). Includes Sam Tucker signature, not sure who that is though. Update: Got this email: hi, your signature is Sam Tucker. A singer song writer from England, Nottinghamshire. Also Montreal. he has 20k followers on facebook.. Serial#S4053379, made in Korea in 1994, includes the used original Epiphone hard case. 　 USA Shipping, handling, and insurance charge will be $50 in USPS's deliverable USA 48 states.
